slideDisclaimer.title: About Helios
slideDisclaimer.description:
Helios is a FREE and open-source third-party add-on developed by the community.
It is a source finder, it scrapes third-party sites (called providers) that you have to provide and are publicly available on the internet.
slideDisclaimer.disclaimer:
Helios does not host, upload or manage any of the content on these sites and Heliosâ€™s add-on, staff and/or developers have no control over the content on these third party sites provided by the end user. Helios claims no responsibility for copyright, legality, accuracy, compliance, decency or any other aspect of the content displayed. It is positively the responsibility of the end user to avoid any actions that may constitute a violation of national, federal or terrestrial laws applicable to them.

Helios doesn't come with any providers, you have to add them manually.

Helios is not developed nor endorsed by wako, for support create issue on its github or discuss with the community on reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/Addons4Wako/
slideDisclaimer.accept: I have read and agree with this

slide2.title: Add some providers
slide2.description: As said earlier, Helios relies on providers to find sources, so let's add some

slide3.title: Choose quality
slide3.description: Select the highest quality you want to play

slide4.title: Debrid Account
slide4.description: If you want to play sources without any buffering issue, it's recommended to connect Helios to a debrid service

slide5.title: Where to play?
slide5.description: Helios can play the source on different player, select your default player

slide6.title: All done
slide6.description: You're all done, if you want to change these settings, go into Wako > Settings > Addons > Helios > Settings page

playlist.item: Automatically seek for next episodes and create a playlist

fileSizeFilter.packageWarning: Filter won't apply on package source
fileSizeFilter.maxSize: Max size (in GB) - Set to 0 to disable it

list.providerSimultaneousLabel: Number of providers to run in parallel. 0 for unlimited. On some phones too many parallel providers can crash helios.

enabledSource.howItWorks: For performance reason, it's recommended to only enable the best quality you prefer. If less than 20 sources are found for this quality, then the lower quality will be used until the lowest quality is reach

realDebrid.explain: RealDebrid is an unrestricted downloader that allows you to quickly download files hosted on the internet

allDebrid.explain: All Debrid is an unrestricted downloader that allows you to quickly download files hosted on the internet
allDebrid.noAccount: No All Debrid account? Click here

premiumize.explain:
Premiumize.me is an unrestricted downloader (and more) that allows you to quickly download files hosted on the internet.

Moreover Premiumize let you test their service for free (you can play one file with a maximum filesize of 5 GB every 120 minutes)

kodi.hostUnreachable: Ouch, your kodi host {{hostName}} is unreachable

providers.providerUrlFailedToAdd: Failed to add Providers, please check the given URL

cloud-account.needToAddProviders: You need to add some providers to enjoy debrid services.

premiumize.invalidApiKey: The API Key is not valid

toasts.copyToClipboard: {{element}} has been copied to your clipboard

open-source.cannotRetrieveUrl: This source is unplayable, cannot retrieve its URL
open-source.addedToPM: Source has been added to you PM account
open-source.failedToAddToPM: Failed to add the source to your PM account: {{error}}
open-source.addedToRD: Source has been added to you RD account
open-source.failedToAddToRD: Failed to add the source to your RD account: {{error}}
open-source.addedToAD: Source has been added to you AD account
open-source.failedToAddToAD: Failed to add the source to your AD account: {{error}}
open-source.sourceNotCached: Failed to retrieved the video URL

toasts.elementumNotInstalled: To use Elementum kodi add-on, you have to install it on kodi
toasts.playlist: Playlist {{playlistName}} has been created/updated. It contains {{items}} items

selectLink.openTitle: This source has multiple links, which one you want to open?

alerts.removeAlert: Are you sure you want to delete the following?

sources.statsInfo: Note: Duplicated torrents are removed from the torrents list

shared.clickToAddDebridAccount: Click here to add a debrid service
shared.clickToAddProvider: Click here to add some provider
shared.noBestSource: Helios didn't find the best source for you, please choose it manually
